title: The Night of the Shroud premiered in Spain by RAI in Valencia
post:
Hi Ron
I don´t mind answering your question nonetheless the best is to wait for having the opportunity to watch this interesting documentary and then draw our own conclusions.
We’ll do it for the second time and with grat pleasure.
THe documentary deals with several Shroud issues but it focusses mainly on 1988 radiocarbon tests and the aftermath of their daing results, hence the name of the documentary.
I’ll highlight the following aspects
The hidden agenda behind planning radiocarbon dating tests involving the labs, Professor Harry Gove and the Vatican is thoroughly analyzed.
An updated information about Sue Benford and Joe Marino’s invisible reweaving repair theory, and unbiased information on Professor Raymond Rogers and Robert Villareal’s investigations on residual material from 1988 radiocarbon samples.
At the end, people watching the documentary become aware that «the night of the Shroud» has come to an end and the truth will prevail
I strongly recommend watching this documentary.
